title: Extra Bold Memorial Font
content:
Hi, I'm after this font quite desperatly, being a stonemason I need to match fonts exactly to keep the new inscription in line with the original. Any help in cracking this would be greatly appreciated.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [photo[1].JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020232559/http:/typophile.com/files/photo%5B1%5D.JPG) | 850.7 KB |
author: fishy_safc

comments.content:
Letterforms match [Clarendon Bold Condensed BT](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020232559/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/clarendon/bold-condensed/). This would work if you slightly increase the weight.  
Don

Although the letter forms match it would take a fair amount of tinkering to get an exact fit for the weight.  
Here is Clarendon Bold Condensed BT with a horizontal bolding of 10. Close but not 100%:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020232559im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ClarendonCondBoldBTwithhorizbolding10_6614.jpg)
  
Anyone else care to try for 100%?  
Don
